RelatedSentence: Prince Charles and his wife Camilla were greeted by hundreds of people today at Halifax city hall as they were officially welcomed to Canada on the first full day of a four - day visit to Canada .

People were bundled up against chilly weather and a light mist over Grand Parade , a square in front of city hall , as the Prince of Wales was welcomed by Governor - General David Johnston , politicians , military officers and aboriginal elders .
Prince Charles inspects honour guards in Halifax on Monday , May 19 , 2014 .
Prince Charles inspects the guard during the official welcome ceremony in Halifax , Nova Scotia , May 19 , 2014 .
